personalInfo.name: Yatin Kande
personalInfo.title: AI & Data Engineer | Full Stack Developer
personalInfo.bio: Building end to end data and AI solutions, from data cleaning and analytics dashboards to ML models and a multi modal RAG assistant using FastAPI and FAISS. Experienced in machine learning pipelines, computer vision (YOLO), and scalable data workflows on AWS. Passionate about turning complex ideas into working demos, such as serverless chatbots and visual speech recognition models.

projects.title: Smart EV Finder
projects.description: A conversational AI assistant that helps drivers locate EV charging stations. Leverages Llama 3 for intent understanding and real-time geolocation to suggest fast chargers along your route, mimicking a human co-pilot experience.

projects.title: Auto Multimodal RAG
projects.description: An intelligent diagnostic tool for the automotive industry. Ingests complex technical manuals and uses multimodal AI to answer mechanic queries, combining text retrieval with visual understanding of car parts and diagrams.

projects.title: Kinesis Key Entry
projects.description: A real-time security system utilizing facial recognition and AWS Kinesis. Processes live video streams to instantly authenticate authorized personnel, creating a seamless, touchless access control solution for high-security zones.

projects.title: Dataset Concierge Bot
projects.description: Your personal data librarian powered by LLMs. Helps researchers find, clean, and retrieve datasets using natural language, featuring persistent memory and smart slot-filling to understand complex data requirements.

projects.title: SmartSoil Crop Recommender
projects.description: A data-driven agricultural dashboard that recommends the best crops for specific regions. Analyzes soil nutrients and climate data to forecast yields, visualizing trends with interactive Plotly charts to help farmers make informed decisions.

projects.title: AI Car Simulation (NEAT)
projects.description: An evolutionary reinforcement learning experiment where a population of AI agents learns to drive a car on a complex track. Implements the NEAT (NeuroEvolution of Augmenting Topologies) algorithm to evolve neural networks from scratch.

projects.title: Lip Read AI
projects.description: Breaking communication barriers with deep learning. A LipNet-based model that translates lip movements into text, trained on the GRID dataset to enable silent speech recognition for accessibility and surveillance applications.

experience.description: Please update this section with your specific experience details from your resume.
Worked on full stack development and cloud infrastructure deployment.
